posts.post_title: John Ward N175 LARGE Gypsy Queen
posts.post_content:
This is the much rarer Large GQ. Tough to find especially in this condition. 

**SOLD**
Wow!  This card is delicious!  GLWS!
Well, missed this! That is one great card, Brian. Your pre-1900 collection is amazing.
